faq.question: Are offers applied automatically?
faq.answer: Yes, once an offer is active, it is automatically applied to eligible items in the customer's cart.

faq.question: Can I limit the number of uses?
faq.answer: Currently, offers are time-bound. Usage limits per customer are coming in the next update.
